name: Silent Kingdom
description:
A fallen world...

Once again, the lords have descend into to chaos. The kingdom is in tyranny.  He who calls himself "The Godking" sits upon the oaken throne. It is left to you, the last lord, striped of all former strength, to end this era of terror. 

Features

Built by a small team of high school students, Silent Kingdom features a combination of a few superb game elements that help set it apart from every other indie Adventure-RPG out there:

  • Fast-paced, "Souls-Like" combat with an intense movement based stucture
  • Exploration across a large open world with over 8 distinct settings and regions
  • A  cryptic story-line that can slowly reveal more about the story of Silent Kingdom
  • A "Hands-Off" approach to story. If you're not interested, It shouldn't bother you
  • Lovable, homemade pixel art
Other Features
  • shop system and over 30 different game-play altering items 
  • Game-pad and keyboard compatible
  • PC, (MAC: coming soon!)

Your computer might think that the game file is a virus or something, but take our word for it: we are not smart enough to make malware, so you'll be fine.

Other than that, it should be pretty easy: Just open the program!
